definitions.definition: A peninsula in Western Asia , comprising most of the modern Republic of Turkey . Bounded by the Black Sea to the north, the Armenian Highland to the east, the Mediterranean Sea to the south and the Aegean Sea to the west.

main_definition: A peninsula in Western Asia , comprising most of the modern Republic of Turkey . Bounded by the Black Sea to the north, the Armenian Highland to the east, the Mediterranean Sea to the south and the Aegean Sea to the west.
